content.html: I'll be very, very sad when that day comes tho. Twitter has played such a huge role in my career. I've gotten to share my writing with thousands of people and travel the world speaking at confs. Beyond that, I've found genuine friendship and support here. I'll miss it dearly.
content.value:
I'll be very, very sad when that day comes tho.

Twitter has played such a huge role in my career. I've gotten to share my writing with thousands of people and travel the world speaking at confs. Beyond that, I've found genuine friendship and support here. 

I'll miss it dearly.
